headline: Will Emerson’s (EMR) Cybersecurity Push and Dividend Hike Reshape Its Industrial Automation Narrative?
summary: In early December 2025, Emerson and Armexa announced a global collaboration to provide DeltaV automation platform users with integrated OT cybersecurity services, including assessments, intrusion detection deployments, and capital project security aligned with ISA/IEC 62443 standards. Emerson also extended its 68-year record of annual dividend increases with a 5.2% raise in November 2025, underscoring consistent cash generation and a strong balance sheet despite recent portfolio...
